alert.note: Alert for Mendocino Coast; Northern Humboldt Interior; Northwestern Mendocino Interior; Southern Humboldt Interior; Southwestern Mendocino Interior (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 21 at 2:07PM PST until February 22 at 1:00AM PST by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Northwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * WHERE...Northern Humboldt Interior, Southern Humboldt Interior, Mendocino Coast, Northwestern Mendocino Interior and Southwestern Mendocino Interior Counties. * WHEN...Until 1 AM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Mendocino Coast; Northern Humboldt Interior; Northwestern Mendocino Interior; Southern Humboldt Interior; Southwestern Mendocino Interior
